trans-unit.target: 空字符串也可以是作者名...

trans-unit.source: Applied to directory name as well

trans-unit.target: 最后给实例起一个名字

trans-unit.source: Treated as modpack version when exported
trans-unit.target: 当作为整合包发布时使用

trans-unit.source: Think twice before pressing the button
trans-unit.target: 此类操作会对游戏文件产生副作用
本页操作修改游戏本地文件，会改变同步状态，修改不需要谨慎（不是你的原因，是文件状态的校验不好做也没做好），但要做好产生意料之外的影响的准备。
自动检测 Java 版本
使用系统中已经预装的 Java 实例
使用自定义 Java 路径(精确到 bin/java.exe,lib 所在目录)

trans-unit.source: Arguments are splited by spaces in one line
trans-unit.target: 非必要的用于调整虚拟机性能的额外参数
Java 虚拟机分配的最大内存

trans-unit.source: Set this according to your system memory
trans-unit.target: 没有自动分配算法，根据经验来设置

trans-unit.source: Instance's configuration is inherited from the global one and will not effect in the opposite direction.
trans-unit.target: 实例启动参数会从全局设置中继承，对实例的修改会被保存，且只在该实例生效，不会影响全局设置
跳过 Java 兼容性检查
当确定 Java 版本兼容时可开启此项

trans-unit.source: Attachments are those "files" created only in restore stage and managed by restore engine. If removed, corresponding file will be removed.
trans-unit.target: 此处做出的修改会在下一次还原时被应用到实例目录文件，包括移除附件也会使实例目录中的对应文件被删除。

trans-unit.source: Components are mod loaders more often while they may be conflict with the other.
trans-unit.target: 大部分组件都是 Mod Loader 且目前支持的组件也只有 Mod Loader。由于 Mod Loader 的特性，只支持同时启用一个除本体以外的组件。

trans-unit.source: Check your Internet connection and try again
trans-unit.target: 可能是不良的互联网链接或不稳定的服务器造成

trans-unit.source: The instance metadata is uneditable according to a reference lock(or tag attched). Components and some attachments are locked before tag removed.
trans-unit.target: 该实例引用自一个整合包，在修改实例部分元数据之前，需要移除引用信息（解锁）。
单击下一步进入授权流程

trans-unit.source: User code will expire in 15 minuts
trans-unit.target: 验证码会在15分钟内失效

trans-unit.source: In that case you should go back and fetch the code again
trans-unit.target: 届时你需要返回上一页面重新开始登录流程

trans-unit.source: Enter the code below in the browser
trans-unit.target: 在浏览器中输入以下验证码

trans-unit.source: by dropping the zip down here
trans-unit.target: 拖入整合包元数据(.zip)以导入

trans-unit.source: Importing modpack from the file failed: {0}
trans-unit.target: 导入下载的整合包文件失败: {0}

trans-unit.source: Reference of {0} has been added to {1}
trans-unit.target: 对 {0} 的引用被添加到 {1}

trans-unit.source: Failed to resolving the modpack reference: {0}
trans-unit.target: 解析整合包所在资源链接失败: {0}

trans-unit.source: Solidifying instance refered to a modpack failed: {0}

Nothing more but be aware of potential mistakes caused by bad Internet connection which are difficult to be figured out. If you are suffering from abnormal game experience or having no confidence in network quality, just turn it on.
trans-unit.target: 下载中心添加的整合包会使用在线数据替换包内数据，该选项会禁用在线数据获取和替换。使用离线数据将大大加速导入过程，但会使导入的实例失去上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Will not replace the metadata with online one
trans-unit.target: 不对下载中心添加的整合包进行数据合并
自动检测 Java 版本
使用系统中已经预装的 Java 实例

trans-unit.source: Using custom Java version(The Java Home directory)

trans-unit.source: Arguments are splited by spaces in one line
trans-unit.target: 非必要的用于调整虚拟机性能的额外参数

trans-unit.source: Set this according to your system memory
trans-unit.target: 没有自动分配算法，根据经验来设置

trans-unit.source: These settings will be inherited if the instance's corresponding one doesn't present
trans-unit.target: 私有实例配置中未设置的项目将会继承全局配置中的对应项目
